channel.title: Help with simple RSC Compressor issue
channel.description:
Hi, I've figured out how run a server properly with EasyRSC. Now I'm trying to figure out how to run the compressor tool so I can edit sounds and models. The only problem is that I keep getting this error whenever use the run-batch to launch the DefCompressor.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: DefCompressor Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Help with simple RSC Compressor issue
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

[quote=“Sladescowl, post:1, topic:533768”]Hi, I’ve figured out how run a server properly with EasyRSC.
Now I’m trying to figure out how to run the compressor tool so I can edit sounds and models.
The only problem is that I keep getting this error whenever use the run-batch to launch the DefCompressor.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: DefCompressor
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

You dont have to launch the DefCompressor … use Compress ALL & Decompress ALL only …

Read full topic
item.source: Help with simple RSC Compressor issue
